thread.title: Wholesale “boutique” Plant Growing Company

title: Wholesale “boutique” Plant Growing Company
text: Questions Business Summary A most unique and special business opportunity! Would you like to be your own supervisor owning and operating a wholesale �boutique� plant growing company right here in the beautiful Mt Washington Valley of Maine and New Hampshire? This most interesting life style boasts a location nestled in the mountains and flow of the Saco River as its neighbors. Would you like to love your work and business so much that forget about the hours which you work at it? Then this may just be for you. Working from your own beautiful restored and renovated mid 1800�s cape style home on 15 acres, all completely set up and in full operation with three separated and independent greenhouses, all heated, with irrigation, temperature controlled with fans each having temperature alarm to protect losing product during and sudden changes in weather. This business is run a wholesale only as mass growth production leads to the most efficient use of time to earn income. Asking Price: $395,000.
